org.lapps.datasource

Class ViewOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lapps.datasource.ViewOptions

  • public abstract class ViewOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies how to present each Document. Possible options include: 1) shows document id; 2) shows document span; 3) shows document content; 4) shows annotation; 5) shows annotation span;
    Author:
    Di Wang
